mapper.insert: insert into commute(s_id, zip_code, address, address_detail, b_location) values(#{s_id}, #{zip_code}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{b_location})
mapper.update: update commute set zip_code=#{zip_code}, address=#{address}, address_detail=#{address_detail}, b_location=#{b_location} where s_id=#{s_id}
